Articles.Content:
So a while ago, I saw a post about a bipedal robot, titled "Mr. Roboto", and I thought: "Surely I can do that, too!".

And so I did. I have posted a video down below, because a video is ilitterally worth 60 frame captures

But first, instructions and specs!

SPECS:

Top speed: 12.6 km/h or 7-ish mph. (4m/s)

Flying speed: This is a mech, not a plane.

Leg resistance: Slinky legs.

Articulation level: Arthritis turtle.

Difficulty: Devil may cry. That is all.

Instructions:

Set the top value to anything from 3 to 5, which is the speed.

Set all the other values to 5, and set the "boing" value to 100.

O moves the right leg forwards, bends the respective knees, toes, and ankles, and moves the other foot out of the way.

L does *litterally* the exact opposite.
